listening.description: Someone talking about a national park on holiday

reading.description: A text about a holiday in the mountains
reading.text: I went on holiday to the mountains last year. I stayed in a small village in a hotel. The weather was great. I went hiking every day. I saw some beautiful views. I took lots of photos. I had a great time.

criticalThinking.description: What are the advantages and disadvantages of going on holiday to the mountains?
